treatments.name: Surface peeling treatment
treatments.desc: Surface peel is biologically active, biphase exfoliating mixture, which reduces the skin surface roughness, heals acne, reduces small wrinkles and brightens hiperpigmentation in the epidermis and the surface between epidermis and dermis.

treatments.name: Whole body shell masssage
treatments.desc: An unbelievably relaxing massage with the warm sea shells and all the richness that the sea has to offer.

treatments.name: Anti-age golden truffle
treatments.desc: Luxurious anti-aging treatment with 24-carat gold and white truffle

treatments.name: Hot oils back massage
treatments.desc: Alleviates muscular tensions, heals stress, moisturizes and soothes your skin.

treatments.name: Power therapy
treatments.desc: Therapy with strong hydrating effect using low and high molecular weight hyaluronic acid. Long lasting hydration on all skin levels.

treatments.name: Cleansing treatment
treatments.desc: It is recommended for people with skin problems, whose shin is prone to inflammation, purulent lesions and blackheads. It effectively reduces acne changes, smoothes and regenerates the epidermis and prevents appearance of further lesions.

treatments.name: Prevent skin aging
treatments.desc: Increase renewing skin, improving firmness, smoothing wrinkless and minimizing pores. Treatment is using 4 thechniques of peeling, included 50% of acids.
